19598.quoteText: We may provide aggregate information, such as demographic, psychographic, and page viewing preference information to third parties as we deem appropriate.
19598.title: Only aggregate data is given to third parties

tosdr.case: Only aggregate data is given to third parties

19599.quoteText: The VG Resource depends on cookies to maintain sessions with our users, to enable you to resume your login on subsequent visits, and to store other pieces of information that are necessary for the proper operation and customization of our applications.
19599.title: This service requires first-party cookies
